snippet.title: CELESTIAL RETURN - GAMEPLAY TRAILER
snippet.description:
Celestial Return is a narrative driven Sci-Fi Noir RPG where you roll as 4 lost souls scheming the Heist of the Millennia. Roll the dice, mix and match your skills, make tough choices, and steal the "Titan Core" to rule a cyborg army!

PLAY THE DEMO: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2819490/Celestial_Return_Demo/

FOLLOW OUR KICKSTARTER CAMPAIGN:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/metispublishing/celestial-return-sci-fi-noir-rpg

WEBSITE: https://www.celestialreturn.com/
X.com: https://x.com/MetaphorGames
Celestial Return Discord Channel: https://discord.gg/CcDnmdwngV
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/metaphorgames_/
YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/@MetaphorGames/videos 
LINKEDIN: https://www.linkedin.com/company/metaphor-games

#indiegame #visualnovel #visualnovelyoutuber #indiegamedevs #unity #visualnovelgames #visualnovels #discoelysium #gamedev #indierpg #ttrpg #crpg
